name: Slippy Snake
description:
Slippy Snake is a game that makes you rethink all of your life choices. For example "Why am I playing a game made by a student, where you become a snake in a world with nothing but grass, dirt, trees, fences, logs, and rocks?"  Slippy Snake is a strategic game where you must dodge various obstacles and beat levels to unlock deeper, more intrusive thoughts.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Anyway, follow my socials

BlueFrogMaster on YouTube, Twitch, TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter.
